p:
The precision was evaluated using repeatability (intraday) and intermediate precision (interday). Intraday and interday variations were established using six independent replicates of the standard reference of each compound on one and two different days, to determine intraday and interday precision, respectively. In order to study the accuracy of the method, recovery experiments were performed. The samples were spiked with known amounts of the standards, at different concentrations levels (low, medium and high): 1 (5, 50 and 150 μg/mL), 3 (20, 100 and 200 μg/mL) and 4 (13.3, 66.8 and 133.4 μg/mL). The average recoveries were calculated according to the following formula:
